name: SMTextView
summary: SMTextView provides an easy way to specify a placeholder using a text view. Includes character count.
description: A custom implementation of UITextView with a placeholder and character count. This implementation contains the ability to customize top, left, and right insets individually. SMTextView is compatible with Interface Builder. SMTextView also contains a character count that can be enabled/disabled. To disable, simply set isCharacterCountEnabled to false.
